title: Boiler Optimizer
description: A full-stack academic planning platform using Next.js 14 and PostgreSQL. Features a custom Mixed-Integer Programming (MIP) engine and Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) chatbot that automates schedule generation based on 10-dimensional user preference vectors. Includes PCA-style projection algorithm to map student traits to college profiles.

title: Fountain of Tech
description: Automated news aggregation platform for autonomous vehicle research. Curates 20 daily technology news items with 90%+ tagging accuracy, helping older adults access the latest technological news tailored to their interests.

title: SHanCE Survey Tool
description: Interactive survey tool built with JavaScript to capture real-time human-autonomy interaction data and physiological sensor streams. Designed for research studies with 50+ participants at the NHanCE Lab.

title: StatWorkbench
description: Comprehensive statistical analysis tool built in R that ingests CSV data to auto-generate diagnostic plots (QQ, Residuals) and perform multivariate analyses. Implements advanced modeling capabilities including Multiple Linear Regression and Ridge Regression for complex dataset interpretation.

title: MarkovSim
description: Competitive simulation environment pitting human users against a Multi-Criteria Decision Making (MCDM) model. Utilizes Markov Chains to predict user behavior patterns and adapt the strategy matrix in real-time, demonstrating predictive modeling concepts.

title: OHT Scheduling Algorithm
description: Optimization-based scheduling algorithm for simulated Overhead Hoist Transports (OHTs) in semiconductor fabs. Conducts stochastic modeling to simulate industrial throughput and identify bottlenecks in Autonomous Material Handling Systems.

title: Hardware I/O Simulation
description: Python-driven hardware I/O simulation using LabJack and Raspberry Pi to control PLC signals. Eliminates the need for expensive physical hardware during systems validation testing at Flanders Electric.
